description.narrative: By 2021, the participation of adolescents will be included in bodies and mechanisms for the management of health services and education, in addition to the corresponding quality indicators, for the priority territories., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Adolescent Empowerment (Covid), Education â€“ General, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, the adolescent population will have improved opportunities to live a healthy life, learn throughout their life and fully exercise their citizenship

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, the participation of adolescents will be included in bodies and mechanisms for the management of health services and education, in addition to the corresponding quality indicators, for the priority territories.

description.narrative: UNICEF has coordinated with various regional and local government education authorities to step up initiatives for mobilising adolescents in the regions prioritized for strengthening the adolescent agenda. They have also reinforced training programmes for adolescents, to strengthen their capacities for participation at school and in the community. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Rate of teenagers attended by education or health services involved in instances of capacity for acting their citizenship.

target.value: 2021:50% of adolescents that complete the training in participation and advocacy promoted by health and education establishments in selected districts, participate in local, provincial an regional instances.

title.narrative: Number of events for participation of children and adolescents for the demand of a quality secondary education in priority areas.
Number of instances or institutionalized mechanisms of participation of adolescents in the services of health and education of the prioritized areas.

actual.value: 2019:Health: 1 instance score 1 Education: 10 instances score 2, 1 instance score 3, 3 score 2

title.narrative: Number of adolescent girls and boys who participate in or lead civic engagement (including online) in UNICEF-supported programmes for COVID-19 preparedness, response and building back better (more resilient, peaceful, greener and sustainable) in the reporting year [COVID]
System Strengthening - Communities - Community (including students') participation in school management committees at primary and secondary levels - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Skills - National education/training policies and plans support the mainstreaming of skills development within the national system - score (1-4), see guidance
